Player History
Signed as a free agent by San Diego on 4/3/1985 to a minor league deal...
Had first career hit on 7/26/1985, off Bryn Smith (MON)...
Hit first career homerun on 8/19/1985, off Ron Darling (NYM)...
2/2/1986: Gets a new one-year contract worth $685,714 through salary arbitration...
2/2/1987: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,514,286 through salary arbitration...
8/17/1987: Signed a contract extension with San Diego, $3,550,000 per year, for 2 years.
Drove in 6 runs against Philadelphia on 8/14/1988...
Signed as a free agent by Kansas City on 2/19/1990 to a 2-year deal worth $1,900,000 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/15/1990, hitting .556 with 2 HR, 6 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/1/1991, hitting .448 with 3 HR, 8 RBI...
